reviews.review_msg: Absolutely amazing guy! Very helpful, caring, great sense of humour. One of my favourite profs at SFU for sure.

This was a pass/fail class (I passed). Although long, Kevin was able to (mostly) keep us all engaged. His honesty about his own biases and experiences helped to facilitate critical and meaningful class discussions. There were occasions where he seemed disorganized, but overall as long as you show up and do the work, you should be fine in his class.
NICE GUY!! loves what he teaches, his easy going and helpful, again super super nice guy! very understanding and compassionate. I would take a class with him again..his laugh is so cute!
Great teacher.  He really knows his stuff and delivers it enthusiastically.  Does his best to include everyone and focusses on assignments that are practical and useful for students.
really nice guy.. and the class is really interesting.. The content is a bit contrite, but if you put in the time, you should be fine..
